header.heading: Michael Doudy
header.text: I'm an NYC-based software engineer that works at Helbiz.

projectCards.title: Helbiz Analytics
projectCards.description: An analytics platform that visualizes aggregated trip data using modern geospatial tools to make informed conclusions about rider usage and vehicle demand
